ok
Here is what i have

            if (itemUsed == 7330 && useWith == 1511) { //green fire
					deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1);
                setAnimation(733);
                firetimer = 15;
makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, 11405, -2, 10); // fire
				}

Ok i made a burntimer to so i need help with making it ware the burn timer hits 30 it will make that global object dissapear how would i do this?
